definitions: in a way that causes laughter and provides entertainment

examples.text: his exquisite manners contrasted amusingly with our rude ways
he could always be relied upon to be amusingly pompous

shortDefinitions: in way that causes laughter and provides entertainment

definitions: used to express amusement at an event or situation

examples.text: amusingly, all the people near me seemed also to come from Wollongong

shortDefinitions: used to express amusement at event or situation
